com.github.katjahahn.optheader

Class OptionalHeader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.katjahahn.Header<OptionalHeaderKey>
      • com.github.katjahahn.optheader.OptionalHeader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PEModule

    public class OptionalHeader
extends Header<OptionalHeaderKey>
    Represents the optional header of the PE file.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  OptionalHeader.MagicNumber
      The magic number of the PE file, indicating whether it is a PE32 or PE32+

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int MAX_SIZE
      Maximum size of the optional header to read all values safely is 240
